original: @5b # // rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @5b # // rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i sa ha dza sam ba ra sva tishtha nam n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i sa ha dza sam ba ra sva tishtha nam n'a ma /
translated: Śrī-sahajasaṃvarasattvasthānam-nāma

original: bod skad du //
analyzed: bod skad du //
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal lhan cig skyes ba bde pa'i mchog / bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal lhan cig skyes ba bde pa'i mchog / bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba /
translated: Shri Sahajasukhitattva-Adhisthana-nama

original: he ru ka phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: he ru ka phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Salutations to Heruka

original: rnal 'byor rnam gsum zhes bya ste //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnam gsum zhes bya ste //
translated: The so-called three yogas🔽Are the blessing, the self-sign,

original: byin gyis brlab dang rang rtags dang // rdzogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bsam med do //
analyzed: byin gyis brlab dang rang rtags dang // rdzogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bsam med do //
translated: And the inconceivable perfect reflection.

original: sna tshogs gzugs can yid du 'ong //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs can yid du 'ong //
translated: Having the form of a variety, pleasing,

original: yid bzhin nor bu'i gzugs 'chang ma //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu'i gzugs 'chang ma //
translated: Bearing the form of the wish-fulfilling gem,

original: zin na dngos grub chen po 'byung //
analyzed: zin na dngos grub chen po 'byung //
translated: If seized, the great siddhi will arise.

original: chos bshad nas ni dbang du bya //
analyzed: chos bshad nas ni dbang du bya //
translated: Having explained the dharma, one should bring under control.

original: yang na ri ba'i rin gyis slu //
analyzed: yang na ri ba'i rin gyis slu //
translated: Or, one should deceive with the price of the mountain.

original: shin tu gsang ba'i sgrub pa pos //
analyzed: shin tu gsang ba'i sgrub pa pos //
translated: The very secret practitioner🔽Should ripen through empowerment,

original: dbang gis yongs su smin pa dang // lha lhar bltas la dngos grub blang //
analyzed: dbang gis yongs su smin pa dang // lha lhar bltas la dngos grub blang //
translated: And having seen the deity as the deity, one should take the siddhi.

original: me long nang gi gzugs brnyan ltar //
analyzed: me long nang gi gzugs brnyan ltar //
translated: Like a reflection in a mirror,

original: gsal la 'dzin med bde ba'i sku //
analyzed: gsal la 'dzin med bde ba'i sku //
translated: Clear, without grasping, the blissful body,

original: nyi shu rtsa lnga yum rnams rdzogs //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa lnga yum rnams rdzogs //
translated: The twenty-five mothers are complete.

original: bltas dang dgong dang 'khrig pa yis //
analyzed: bltas dang dgong dang 'khrig pa yis //
translated: By looking, laughing, and copulating,

original: mkha' sbyor bde ba'i pho brang du //
analyzed: mkha' sbyor bde ba'i pho brang du //
translated: in the palace of the bliss of the union with the sky,

original: dbang gi rgyal pos gar byas pas //
analyzed: dbang gi rgyal pos gar byas pas //
translated: the king of the powerful one dances,

original: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun dgyes //
analyzed: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun dgyes //
translated: and all the heroes and yoginīs are delighted.

original: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro dgyes pa'i glu //
analyzed: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro dgyes pa'i glu //
translated: The song that delights the heroes and ḍākinīs,

original: aam dang ham gi sgra brjod pas //
analyzed: aam dang ham gi sgra brjod pas //
translated: the sound of aṃ and haṃ,

original: tshangs pa'i ri bo rtse nas nyil //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i ri bo rtse nas nyil //
translated: the peak of Mount Brahmā collapses.🔽The foam of the ocean is born,

original: rgya mtsho'i lbu ba bltams pa dang // gnas pa bzhi yi ri ma pa yis //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i lbu ba bltams pa dang // gnas pa bzhi yi ri ma pa yis //
translated: and by the sound of the four abodes,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur //
translated: one becomes Vajrasattva himself.

original: dbang phyug dam pa'i gsang gtam 'dis //
analyzed: dbang phyug dam pa'i gsang gtam 'dis //
translated: By this secret story of the supreme lord,🔽one enters the city of the vajra sky,

original: nam mkha' rdo rje grong du 'jug bde chen dag pa'i zhing @6a * //
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje grong du 'jug bde chen dag pa'i zhing @6a * //
translated: sees the pure realm of great bliss,

original: khams mthong // thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i sku //
analyzed: khams mthong // thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i sku //
translated: and all is the coemergent body.

original: shes rab rdo rje rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: shes rab rdo rje rnal 'byor ma //
translated: The vajra of wisdom is the yoginī,

original: gnyis med bde pa'i rnam pa can //🔽ma ning zhes byar brjod pa ste //
analyzed: gnyis med bde pa'i rnam pa can // ma ning zhes byar brjod pa ste //
translated: and the form of nondual bliss🔽is said to be the “neutral state.”

original: cig zung 'jug ces byar brjod //
analyzed: cig zung 'jug ces byar brjod //
translated: It is said to be “union.”

original: sgrib pa dang bral chos sku 'dir //
analyzed: sgrib pa dang bral chos sku 'dir //
translated: In this dharmakāya free of obscurations,

original: rakta la sogs byang sems rnams //
analyzed: rakta la sogs byang sems rnams //
translated: The bodhicitta of blood and so forth

original: rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid kyi //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid kyi //
translated: is the nature of the support and the supported.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di nyid do //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di nyid do //
translated: This is all maṇḍalas.

original: dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs bdag byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Śrī Sahaja Sādhana Called Self-Consecration

original: rgyal po aindra bh'u ti 'bring pos mdzad pa /
analyzed: rgyal po aindra bh'u ti 'bring pos mdzad pa /
translated: Composed by King Indrabhūti the Middle

original: rje mi nyag chen pos bsgyur ba rdzogs so//
analyzed: rje mi nyag chen pos bsgyur ba rdzogs so//
translated: The translation by the great lord Minyag is complete.
